name: Phases (itch) (secretos del animador)
description:
this game tell the story of how 2 brothers were separated due to an accident in a old building of the ancient civilization, this accident causes that one of the brother travel to the past, in the exact time before the ruin. In this  game you may use all kind of tolls in other resolver diferent  tipes of puzzles,traps and minigame. One of the main characteristic of the game is the fact that you can choose beetwen 2 diferent times, the present time and the past time.

Control: 

Mouse: ya may use the mouse to interact with diferent object.

Arrow: Move the character

Tab: change time

Q: interact with objects

Temas : Back to the Future

Nombre del equipo: Los secretos del animador

Miembros del equipo:

kevin Villanueva ( Animador y  artista 3D )

Cristian Rea Bernal ( Game designer, modelador y artista 3D)

Carlos Urribari ( Programador Unreal y director de Arte)

Antony Rumiche ( Compositor, sonidista)
